title: Delete a note
description: Removes the note from a listing.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: listingId
path.description: The ID of the listing the note is associated with.

path.name: offerId
path.description: The ID of the offer the note is associated with. Should be 0 if the note is not associated with a fixed price offer.

returns.description: <NoteResponse> Whether the operation was successful and the note details.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: OfferId
fields.description: The ID of the fixed price offer, or 0 if the note is not associated with a fixed price offer.
